experience.description: I was part of a team developing mobile applications and web pages.
I was part of a team dedicated to continuous improvement, my main role was to identify areas of improvement in the software for the completion of tasks and the automation of processes.
My main function was the development of new systems for future implementation, as well as the maintenance of existing systems dedicated to automating processes.
I was part of a software engineering apprentice program.
I'm part of a team of .NET developers working with Oracle databases and ASP.NET applications.
